items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute Fall dress!
items.body: Cute,runs a bit large. Read more
items.author: MBT

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress for the season, runs a little on the larger size, check the measurements before
items.body: I ordered this for a different type of festive look. I ordered Navy and truthfully it looks like a dark brown/black , not navy. The material is a bit rough and scratchy - I'm thinking it will soften up as it gets washed, like flannel often does. It runs a little bit on the larger side, so you may want to double check the measurements and not just order your usual size. I'm tall so I will probably pair this with dark leggings to complete my holiday look Read more
items.author: Linda B.

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Small Through Chest but Large Elsewhere
items.body: I really wanted to love this dress but it’s just not meant to be. I ordered it to wear as a tunic with leggings for cool weather and read all the reviews and studied the size chart prior to ordering. The XL would have fit my 38G chest best according to the size chart but all of the reviewers noted that the dress runs large with recommendations to size down. I did that and what a mistake! The size L dress will not even button around my chest. I had to leave the top two buttons undone to get it around me and it still pulls noticeably around my chest and back with no stretch to the fabric. I’m about equal in inches top and bottom and this dress is ample through the waist and hips. I tried it with a tank top underneath the open buttons but it’s not a look that I like; it just looks dumpy. This dress is made of a soft, lightweight, polyester/cotton/rayon flannel, almost like a nightgown; I imagine it would have been fabulous to wear in cold weather. I chose the green color which resembles navy and green Blackwatch tartan. All of the seams are well-stitched and serged with no raw edges or loose stitches. The buttons appear to be coconut shell which may explain the care instructions: the dress must be hand-washed or machine-washed in cold water on a delicate cycle and line-dried. So, perhaps the fabric was not pre-shrunk? It also cannot be ironed according to the label. Considering the dress came vacuum-paced in a plastic bag and was wrinkled upon arrival, it desperately needs an ironing. Had this dress fit me, I feel it would have been a go-to for cool weather. But I cannot recommend it for hourglass-shaped women because it runs small through the bust compared to the waist and hips. The complicated care instructions are also a negative; flannel should be able to go into the dryer for easy care, just like a nightgown. I had great expectations for this dress but it did not live up to them. Read more
items.author: flowergrrl

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars True to size
items.body: True to size, cute Read more
items.author: Vicki Clark

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Itchy fabric.
items.body: The fabric is very itchy and stiff. I couldn't wear it. I had to make the return. Read more
items.author: D3AN

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Bad fit
items.body: While I love the pattern and cozy material of this dress, the overall construction is not comfortable. The waist is strangely oversized, but then tight in the bust with no stretch. I agree with others that the fit is odd. I ordered my true size Large, and it was both too big and also too small. Not right for me and I wouldn’t recommend it to others Read more
items.author: Claire

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and comfy
items.body: Very good quality. The length is also perfect for the office. The dress itself is very warm and comfy. Read more
items.author: Nicole

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Runs big, cute dress
items.body: For size context, I am 5'3" and ordered a Size Large recommended for Bust 37.8-40.2 (Me: 38), Waist 29.9-32.3 (Me: 30) and Hip 40.6-42.9 (Me: 38). I should have gone with a Size Medium as this is too big and looks frumpy in all three areas. The color and material are fine and look nice. This is a cute dress. I'm hoping I can salvage it by throwing on a belt on the seam to cinch it in a bit. Read more
items.author: Sunshine_E

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Navy, Black, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
